name: eco-palud-back
description: api application de commerce circulaire de la zone des Paluds
author: Florian Faucher

scripts.prisma:generate: npm run sync-models && npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run sync-models && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:deploy: npm run sync-models && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run sync-models && npx prisma studio
